Resource.Title: The definition of a myspace service kind

Summary.Description: This is a resource that describes the general class of astrogrid service of a particular kind. Other resources can point to this resource to make it clear that they are of this particular kind.

vr:Publisher.vr:Title: Astrogrid
vr:Publisher.vr:Description: Astrogrid is a UK consortium aiming to provide Virtual Observatory software.
